Load all packages needed
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


## Problem 1

import and clean the `Mr.Trash Wheel` sheet from `Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx`

```{r}
trashwheel_df <- 
  read_excel(
    "data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 
    range = "A2:N406") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(!is.na(dumpster)) %>% 
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls))
```

import and clean the `2018 Precipitation` and `2019 Precipitation` from `Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx`

```{r}
percipitation_2018_df <-
  read_excel(
    "data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "2018 Precipitation",
    range = "A2:B14"
  ) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(percipitation_inch = total) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(percipitation_inch)) %>% 
  mutate(year = "2018")

percipitation_2019_df <-
  read_excel(
    "data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "2019 Precipitation",
    range = "A2:B14"
  ) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(percipitation_inch = total) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(percipitation_inch)) %>% 
  mutate(year = "2019")
```
